about_the_game:
Shadows of truth is a detective horror game where in each episode you are collecting clues, solving the relation of the clues and getting closer to the truth.

In this demo you are going to experience few areas of the main game to give you the overall look and feel of the game.

You are a detective searching for the disappearance of John who had left behind scattered clues. You found the clues and plotted them in your mind and got close to the answers, but things took different turn someone is chasing you in your nightmares and it keeps coming! Back in reality someone else is also trying to reach to John. You need to escape and get to the answers!

Key Game Features:

Photorealistic graphics

Immersive VR experience

Solving clues on a mind board

Hiding from enemies

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: i3-10100 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 or above
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR on Meta with Meta Quest 2
  • Additional Notes: This is a VR only game and a VR headset is required!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: i5-10400 or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3050 8GB or above
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR on Meta with Meta Quest 2
  • Additional Notes: This is a VR only game and a VR headset is required!
